Author: thrifteddenim
Text: yes yes i agree. i have a pattern of going on a run or working out before a date if i can. if anything, it mentally makes me feel better about myself during the meal or drink. feeling like i'm balancing things out (even if it's not technically true).   i'd eat a little something beforehand though. cause OMG this could be the date of your life! i'd hate for ed to have the biggest seat at the table. you got this friend!   let us know how it goes!!!

Author: Duskyroses
Text: Maybe go on a run, take a warm bath, pop on a show, before :) if you drink before you’ll only be more stressed about the calories if you guys do end up eating. If you go for a walk or a run you can tell yourself you did your best to prepare. But really the walk or run should be about soothing your mind not purging calories, and that’s why I think a relaxing bath could help too.   You have a lovely date for all of us on this sub! I truly hope it goes well! It’s okay if you eat on it, view it as a one time treat if your brain allows that. Sometimes it helps me to remind myself that even if I went over by say, 1,000 calories, I am only one day further from my goal. Just one little day :) good luck!
